title: $300 Paypal for One of the Following....

posts.post_title: $300 Paypal for One of the Following....
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone,

I have $300 Paypal burning a hole in my pocket. Wanted to see what I could score because ebay isn't doing it. This is what I'm looking for at the minimum grades.

T209 Color Contentnea type
T211 Red Sun type 
T212 Obak
T215 Red Cross type 
1933 Butter Cream Hall of Famer
1933 Uncle Jacks Hall of Famer
1933 George C. Miller Hall of Famer
1933 Tattoo Orbit--Need several
1933 Delong--Need 9 cards
